root.name: Skateboard Park Tycoon
root.description: HistorySkateboard Park Tycoon was developed by Cat Daddy Games. It is one of Cat Daddy's earliest works and is the first of three games in the "Skateboard Park Tycoon" series. This company has developed an unhealthy amount of cash-in "tycoon" games. They have also done some work on some quality games too though, such as Flight Simulator 2001 and Need For Speed: High Stakes.
